name: Pingbullet
description: Send yourself regular pings via Pushbullet.

PUSHBULLET_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Access token from Pushbullet Account Settings page.

PUSH_TITLE.description: Title of the message to send.

PUSH_BODY.description: Body of the message to send.

PUSH_URL.description: URL of the message to send. If present, sends a `link` message.

ACTIVE.description: Only send messages if set to `true`

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: No web processes should run, only scheduled jobs.
